subtitle: Fisher Transform — normalizes price to enhance turning points.

measures.how_to_read: Look for sharp inflections and zero crosses.
measures.caveats: Can be whippy; combine with filters.
measures.what_it_measures: Fisher Transform derived from market data.

assistant_hints: Look for extremes and inflections; confirm with price action.
Smooth or lengthen window to reduce whipsaws.
Combine with bands/RSI or trend filter.
Avoid trading isolated signals during news.
